com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class PeerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.PeerHandler

  • public class PeerHandler
extends Object
    Handles peer connection.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BlockingQueue<ZabMessage.Message> broadcastingQueue
      The broadcasting queue of peer.
      protected Future<Void> ftBroad
      The future of broadcasting task.
      protected Future<Void> ftSync
      The future of synchronizing task.
      protected int heartbeatIntervalMs
      The intervals of sending HEARTBEAT messages.
      protected long lastAckedEpoch
      Last acknowledged epoch of the follower, it helps leader decides whose transaction history will be selected as initial history.
      protected Zxid lastAckedZxid
      The last acknowledged transaction id from this peer.
      protected long lastHeartbeatTimeNs
      Last replied HEARTBEAT time of the peer (in nanoseconds).
      protected long lastProposedEpoch
      Last proposed epoch of the follower, it helps leader decides new proposed epoch.
      protected Zxid lastZxid
      Last transaction id in peer's log.
      protected long newleaderEpoch
      The epoch of the NEWLEADER message.
      protected String serverId
      The server id of the peer.
      protected Participant.SyncPeerTask syncTask
      The synchronizing task.
      protected Transport transport
      Passed by Participant to send messages.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • lastProposedEpoch

        protected long lastProposedEpoch
        Last proposed epoch of the follower, it helps leader decides new proposed epoch.

      • lastAckedEpoch

        protected long lastAckedEpoch
        Last acknowledged epoch of the follower, it helps leader decides whose transaction history will be selected as initial history.

      • lastHeartbeatTimeNs

        protected long lastHeartbeatTimeNs
        Last replied HEARTBEAT time of the peer (in nanoseconds).

      • lastZxid

        protected Zxid lastZxid
        Last transaction id in peer's log. It's used by leader to decide how to synchronize the follower in synchronizing phase.

      • lastAckedZxid

        protected Zxid lastAckedZxid
        The last acknowledged transaction id from this peer. It's used by CommitProcessor to find out the transaction which will be committed.

      • serverId

        protected final String serverId
        The server id of the peer.

      • broadcastingQueue

        protected final BlockingQueue<ZabMessage.Message> broadcastingQueue
        The broadcasting queue of peer.

      • syncTask

        protected Participant.SyncPeerTask syncTask
        The synchronizing task. For the handler of leader, it's null.

      • newleaderEpoch

        protected long newleaderEpoch
        The epoch of the NEWLEADER message. It will be sent to follower after the synchronization is done.

      • transport

        protected final Transport transport
        Passed by Participant to send messages.

      • heartbeatIntervalMs

        protected final int heartbeatIntervalMs
        The intervals of sending HEARTBEAT messages.

      • ftSync

        protected Future<Void> ftSync
        The future of synchronizing task.

      • ftBroad

        protected Future<Void> ftBroad
        The future of broadcasting task.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PeerHandler

        public PeerHandler(String serverId,
           Transport transport,
           int heartbeatIntervalMs)
        Constructs PeerHandler object.
        Parameters:
        serverId - the server id of the peer.
        transport - the transport object used to send messages.
        heartbeatIntervalMs - the interval of sending HEARTBEAT messages.
